spouseRoom_Jasper: Ah a place to call my own. The scent of ink and paper, @. That's the scent of home.$1#$b#But it wouldn't be a real home without you, my love.$4
Rainy_Day_0: I love the smell of a rainy day, it's like the sky is kissing the earth.$1#$b#What? I can romanticise the weather if I wish, @.$4
Rainy_Day_1: Today seems like a good day to finish my revisions on 'Mysteries of the Dwarves'.#$b#Stay safe out there, @. I love you.
Rainy_Day_2: Is there anything you'd like me to do around the house, @? It helps my brain work if my hands are busy.
Rainy_Day_3: The latest 'research' from Peasbody has been published.#$b#I shouldn't read it, I know... But...$5
Rainy_Day_4: Oh, this weather makes my leg itch something fiendish.#$b#Sorry, I'm afraid I may not be up for much today.
Rainy_Day_Jasper: Time to work my way through some of this reading pile.$3#$b#Stay safe today, my love, and make sure to wear a coat.$1
patio_Jasper: Sometimes I like to close my eyes, breath in deep, and just clear my thoughts.#$b#It is then that I hear them, @. The birds in the trees, the insects buzzing around.#$b#I become a part of nature.
Rainy_Night_0: Good evening gorgeous. Oh, you're soaked through!#$b#Please take care of yourself. I do not wish for you to get sick.
Rainy_Night_1: My writing was not working, thus I tried my hand at cooking.[236]#$b#It's not exactly gourmet fare, I'm afraid, but it should warm you up.
Rainy_Night_2: Oh the gall of some people!#$b#Sorry, my love. I am not mad at you! I delved into the latest research of Professor Peasbody and oh... his proposals are still preposterous!^Sorry, my love. I am not mad at you! I delved into the latest research of Professor Peasbody and oh... her proposals are still preposterous!
Rainy_Night_3: Oh my dear, you are soaked! Come here, let me help you out of those wet clothes.$2#$b#No, this isn't an excuse to... well...maybe it is...$4
Rainy_Night_4: Please, let me take your coat. Tonight feels like a good night for curling up together and telling stories, don't you think?#$b#Or yes, perhaps other things too.$4
Rainy_Night_5: Ah, the sound of rain on the roof, my favorite person beside me...#$b#What more could I ever ask for?
Rainy_Night_Jasper: There has been a most insistent dripping all day, my love.#$b#I fear we may have acquired a leak. I shall check in the morning.$2
Indoor_Day_0: Good morning my dear! Please be careful out there.[195]#$b#I may not be much of a chef, but I can scramble a decently fluffy egg!
Indoor_Day_1: I failed to sleep last night - too many ideas buzzing in my head, thus I'll be living on this concoction today.[253]
Indoor_Day_2: You've really brought %farm back to life, @. I used to visit here: a scrawny kid with a pocket full of rocks.#$b#Your grandfather was always kind to me. He'd be proud of what you've done.$3
Indoor_Day_3: Hmm... How should I spend today? Writing? Perhaps a little light reading?#$b#Oh, and I suppose I can find some time in my busy schedule to fit in some housework too, my love.$4
Indoor_Day_4: You tend to what needs to be tended out there, and I shall hold the fort! %pet and I against an army of dust bunnies!$3
Indoor_Day_Jasper: You know, my love, I am rather enjoying being a house spouse.$3
Indoor_Night_0: Come here my love, curl with me by the fire. Would you like to hear a tale?$4#$b#Of the goblins? Or would you rather learn of my 'wild and reckless' student days?$1#$b#Oh, the pranks Cameron lured me into!$3
Indoor_Night_1: They say 'diamonds are a girl's best friend', but can diamonds hold a scintilating conversation?[72]$4#$b#A gift for you. Please don't love it more than you love me!$3
Indoor_Night_2: My apologies, I did not get much done today. I have been unravelling some complex theories.#$b#Oh, I do not wish to bore you with the details, my love.$2#$b#You wish to be bored? Very well then!$3
Indoor_Night_3: Spent the day procrastinating... Oh, I meant cleaning.$1#$b#Everything should be dust free!$3
Indoor_Night_4: Oh goodness! Is that the time? I was lost in my thoughts.#$b#Sorry, I didn't cook you dinner.
Indoor_Night_Jasper: I have just put the final touches on my latest research paper.$1#$b#Now to submit it, and hope...$2
Outdoor_0: Good morning! I took a quick stroll around before breakfast - Doctor's orders - everything seems in good order.
Outdoor_1: Ah, the fresh, clear air. I love it here, @. And am so grateful to be part of your life.
Outdoor_2: I caught a flash of color in the trees, down by the southern border. I do not think it was a bird.$1#$b#Dare I hope it was one of our junimo friends?$4
Outdoor_3: It is so peaceful here. I am not sure I could ever return to the bustle of the city.
Outdoor_4: I awoke at dawn, my mind too busy to permit sleep, and stepped out for a walk.#$b#I caught a glimpse of a dark figure in the fields. Do you think it was our subterranean friend, @?$1
funLeave_Jasper: I guess I'd better get some exercise. Doctor's orders! And I shall visit some friends.#$b#Have an excellent day, @. Remember, you rock!
funReturn_Jasper: Oh, that walk really took it out of me. I'm exhausted!#$b#I hope you had a more energetic day, @?
TwoKids_0: The kids certainly keep me on my toes! I taught them about volcanos.$1#$b#We made a slight mess in the kitchen...#$b#...and then I taught them all about cleaning up after themselves!$3
TwoKids_1: The kids and I had some fun in the garden today. I feel %kid1 might aspire to become an archeologist!#$b#%kid2, however, was more interested in excavating the contents of their nose...$2
TwoKids_2: %kid2 said 'geode' today! Or at least, that's what I like to think they said.#$b#It was probably just baby babble and wishful thinking, however.
TwoKids_3: The kids and I have been playing 'school'. I believe %kid1 is beginning to grasp the priciples of anthropology.$1#$b#%kid2, however, is currently classifying all the toys by flavor.$3
Good_1: Have I told you today that you're amazing?#$b#No? Well, that's awfully slack of me, I really need to up my game, don't I?$1#$b#@. You're amazing, and I love you.$4
Good_2: Ah good day my dear! Just wanted you to know that I ad-ORE you!$4#$b#Sorry. A bit of geology humor.$3
Good_4: Fresh air is good for the soul. And having you beside me, my dear, is an even better balm.$3#$b#I love you.$4
Good_5: Why yes, I have been borrowing Gunther's books. They have been most... inspirational.$4#$b#If you are home early tonight, perhaps we can both profit from my 'research'.$3
Good_6: Our home has become my haven, my dear. I truly now feel my heart is at ease.$1
Good_7: I may never reveal the secrets of the dwarves to the world, @, but I have found something - someone - better instead. You.$4#$b#Thank you for being amazing, and tolerating my foibles.$3
Good_8: You are my sun, my moon, my starlit sky...$1#$b#Well, yes, I did hear it in a movie, once, but it's true, regardless!$5
Good_9: I never thought I'd find the simple things so rewarding. Fresh food, a warm bed...#$b#and the most gorgeous man beside me.$3^And the most wonderful woman beside me.$3
Neutral_0: $p 5070124#Hmmm... I was just penning a letter to Cameron. Shall I give him your regards?$1^Hmmm... I was just penning a letter to Cameron. Shall I give her your regards?$1|I am a litle focused right now, working on my latest proposal.
Neutral_1: I fear I may have overdone it today... Perhaps tomorrow I should take things more easily.
Neutral_2: I am sorry my love, I'm a little busy right now... Jas asked me some rather thought-provoking questions, and I am formulating an appropriate response.
Neutral_3: $1 ZuCU_Tenure#I find myself missing my old lecturing days - how would you feel if I applied for a tenure at ZuCU?$2$k#$e#Another application for tenure declined.. I am afeared you are stuck with me, @.$3
Neutral_4: Today the ideas are flowing like water... Oh it is a joy, @, to be thus inspired!
Neutral_5: There is an ache deep in my bones, @. I fear age is beginning to creep in.
Neutral_6: I've been poring over the newspapers, @, and it appears petty theft is on the rise across the Valley.$2#$b#Perhaps it is merely hopeful optimism, but could it be connected to the dwarves?
Neutral_7: #$1 ZuCU_Submission#I have submitted another paper for consideration. I am hoping it shall help restore my reputation.$k#$e#I shall be recording some tutorials for the freshman classes at ZuCU, @! It is not the same as teaching, but at least I will not have to visit the city.
Neutral_8: I fear Vincent may love arthropods - well, arachnids - a little too much. I appear to have acquired a pet spider.$2
Neutral_9: ...so if the dwarves arrival disrupted the shadowfolk...That would explain...#$b#Oh, hello @. Sorry, I'm a little busy right now.
Bad_0: I fear I am beginning to suffer from cabin fever. My creativity is becoming stifled. Please, I need some space.
Bad_1: I sometimes wonder if I am your husband or your housekeeper. Please, @, I implore you - talk to me!$2
Bad_2: The spark that kindled between us has now flickered and died. I understand your reluctance to be bound to a broken old fool like myself.
Bad_3: Perhaps it is time I contacted Cameron again. At least he had time for me.$2^Perhaps it is time I contacted Cameron again. At least she had time for me.$2#$b#Even if it was to argue.
Bad_4: Even fierce debate is preferable to abject silence. I miss what we had, @. Please, give me a second chance.$2
Bad_5: Oh... now you have time for me? I shall join you in a minute, please let me finish up these notes.$2#$b#Yes, my work is important!$5
Bad_6: You know, the goblin chieftain tried to trick me into wedding his daughter.$2#$b#Perhaps she would've been a more agreeable match.$5
Bad_7: *sighs* I shall regret saying this, I'm sure, but the goblins made for better company.$5#$b#At least they talked to me occasionally...$2
Bad_8: Sometimes I wonder if you'd even notice if I never returned from the caves.$2#$b#I miss what we had, @. I believed you were The One.$2
Bad_9: ....Can't you see I'm busy? Oh, I don't look like I'm doing anything?$5#$b#Just leave me to my thoughts. Please, @.$2
spring_1: Spring has sprung! I'm sorry I can't help much on the farm, but I made you lunch.[240]
spring_8: I love watching the earth come back to life.
spring_12: I am looking forward to the Egg Festival tomorrow, @. 'Tis a time to celebrate renewal, and rebirth. As I myself feel reborn.$1
spring_23: Love is in the air, my dear, and there's a spring in my step.$3#$b#I hope you shall do the honor of dancing with me tomorrow.$1
spring_24: I've got my dancing shoes on and I'm ready to go! But, I'll understand if you choose a more sure-footed partner.#$b#But I do hope you'll dance with me.$4
summer_1: Summertime, a time to cherish the great outdoors.$1#$b#Please remember to wear a sunhat, my love.$4
summer_8: Sorry if I was restless last night... the heat makes it hard to sleep.$2
summer_15: My father was a jovial man. He always had time for me, even though he must have been exhausted and I was always full of questions.#$b#I can only hope that one day I shall be as good a father as he. I miss him so much, @.
summer_11: Oh, I am actually looking forward to the luau today, my love!$1#$b#With you by my side, I truly feel part of the community.$3
summer_28: Tonight our jellyfish visitors migrate past, headed for the warmer waters of the south.#$b#I shall meet you on the beach tonight, my love.$4
fall_1: Ah, the halcyon days of the harvest have arrived!#$b#Oh, I do love this autumn season. Autumn, such a beautiful word.$1
fall_22: My love! I am pondering how to celebrate my birthday this year.#$b#Oh, who am I kidding? I shall probably immerse myself in a book and forget all about it.$1#$b#I love you, and I shall see you tonight.$4
fall_15: I'm looking forward to the Fair tomorrow. I am certain your display will impress.#$b#Me? I shall catch up with Marlon and Clint. I enjoy their quiet company.$3
fall_16: Oh, such a glorious day for the fair! And it shall be a good to catch up with some old friends.$1
fall_26: When I was a child, I loved the Spirit's Eve festival. Now the thought of entering that maze gives me chills.#$b#I know it is all in fun, @. But...$2
winter_1: Oh, chilly isn't it, my love? Winter has cast her blanket across the land.$1
winter_7: Will you try your hand at the fishing contest tomorrow, my love?
winter_15: Ah yes, the travelers are in town! The perfect chance to indulge in some gift shopping.#$b#Who am I buying for? Oh, let's see... Gunther, Rasmodius... maybe Miss Penny...$3#$b#Oh there's someone I've forgotten? Now who could that be?$1
winter_25: Happy Winter Star my love. What am I thankful for? Oh, so many things!#$b#Friendships... a good book. And, of course, you my love. Happy Winter Star. I love you.[578 565 553 547 347]$4
winter_28: And so we bid farewell to another year, my love. What will the next year bring, do you think?[459]#$b#Adventure? New discoveries? Oh, I do not mind, as long as we are together.$4
